languages.text: "Раскаяние не снимает ответственности за мою роль в произошедшем. Я предал Лекс, а предателям нет пути назад".
"Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."
languages.original_text: "Раскаяние не снимает ответственности за мою роль в произошедшем. Я предал Лекс, а предателям нет пути назад".

traits.locale_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."
"Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."
"Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."
"Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."
"Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."
"Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

languages.text: "Reue befreit mich nicht von meiner Schuld. Ich habe das Lex verraten. Es gibt kein Zurück für Verräter."
languages.original_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Reue befreit mich nicht von meiner Schuld. Ich habe das Lex verraten. Es gibt kein Zurück für Verräter."

languages.text: « Le remords ne m'absout pas de ma culpabilité dans cette triste histoire. J'ai trahi la Lex, un acte que rien ne peut racheter. »
languages.original_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

traits.locale_text: « Le remords ne m'absout pas de ma culpabilité dans cette triste histoire. J'ai trahi la Lex, un acte que rien ne peut racheter. »

languages.text: “即便是悔过，也无法免除我应付的责任。我背叛了帝国法典，叛徒没有从头再来的机会。”
languages.original_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

traits.locale_text: “即便是悔过，也无法免除我应付的责任。我背叛了帝国法典，叛徒没有从头再来的机会。”

languages.text: «Los remordimientos no me absuelven de la culpa de lo sucedido. He traicionado la Lex. No hay vuelta atrás para los traidores».
languages.original_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

traits.locale_text: «Los remordimientos no me absuelven de la culpa de lo sucedido. He traicionado la Lex. No hay vuelta atrás para los traidores».

languages.text: 「自責の念は、起きたことの責めを負うべきであるという事実から私を解放してくれはしません。私はレックスを裏切りました。裏切り者には後戻りはできません」
languages.original_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

traits.locale_text: 「自責の念は、起きたことの責めを負うべきであるという事実から私を解放してくれはしません。私はレックスを裏切りました。裏切り者には後戻りはできません」

languages.text: "Yüreğimi dağlayan pişmanlık, suçlu olduğum gerçeğini değiştirmiyor. Lex'e ihanet ettim. Hainler, ikinci bir şansı hak etmez."
languages.original_text: "Remorse does not absolve me from being culpable for what has transpired. I have betrayed the Lex. There is no going back for traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Yüreğimi dağlayan pişmanlık, suçlu olduğum gerçeğini değiştirmiyor. Lex'e ihanet ettim. Hainler ikinci bir şansı hak etmez."
